svg.text: Three-Domain Ontological Mapping: Golf Metaphor ‚Üí Mathematical Reality ‚Üí LLM Development

g.text: f: S ‚Üí S with type œÑ ‚àà T

text.tspan: Golf provides the intuitive spatial metaphor that makes high-dimensional navigation comprehensible.
Mathematics provides the formal semantic structure that ensures theoretical soundness and compositionality.
LLM Development provides the practical implementation context where theory meets iterative reality.

svg.text: This triple mapping enables developers to apply category-theoretic optimization strategies using golf's endemic ontology.
